ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.TEXT:
I am a backend-focused software engineer driven by building reliable, scalable systems for complex business domains. My core stack is Java, Spring Boot, AWS, and PostgreSQL, but I enjoy working across the whole product – from cloud infrastructure to frontend and mobile.

Over the past 6 years, I have launched SaaS platforms, high-load fintech solutions, and microservices — both as part of a team and as a freelance consultant. My approach is pragmatic and product-oriented: I care about clean code, automation, and creating solutions that make a difference for users and business.

I enjoy working in cross-functional teams, mentoring junior colleagues, and learning new technologies. If you have a challenging project or an idea to discuss, let’s connect!
